Chinese FM calls for direct talks between DPRK and U.S. 
    Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Tang Jiaxuan, Chinese Foreign Minister, on March 6 said that the "nuclear issue" of Korea should be settled at the direct talks between the DPRK and the U.S, according to Xinhua News report.
 China has exerted much effort to promote the peaceful talks between both sides, he added.

Congratulatory message to Czech President 
    Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Vaclav Klaus on his election as President of the Czech Republic.
 The message expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, and sincerely wished the president great success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

Message of sympathy to Algerian President 
    Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, yesterday sent a message expressing deep sympathy to Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika, government, people, victims and their bereaved families in connection with a recent crash of an airliner that claimed a big human loss.
